Question.Subject: Im in school for photography and i want to work in forensic so what else do i need to do.?

ChosenAnswer: Sciences - principally biology but also chemistry.

Answers.Answer: You need a background in law enforcement. It's not enough to have photography skills. Talk to your academic adviser, see what they recommend.
